camera_read_raw:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor blockInSamples="1" create="FileReader" cutoffInSamples="0" offsetInSamples="0" path="camera">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="camera" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_merge:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_functionals:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
socket_video_client:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor create="SocketReader" format="3" port="9999" schannels="3" sdepth="8" sheight="480" ssr="25.0" swidth="640">
			
		
	<output channel="socket" pin="camera" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>

<sensor create="Audio" option="audio" scale="true">

</sensor>
socket_video_server:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor channel="3" create="Camera" depth="8" fps="25.0" height="480" option="camera" width="640">
	
		
	<output channel="video" pin="camera" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
avi:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<load name="ssiavi"/>
<sensor create="Camera" option="camera">
	
		
	<output channel="video" pin="video" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor blockInSamples="512" create="Audio" option="audio" scale="false" sr="44100">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>

<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssicontrol"/>
<sensor create="Mouse">

</sensor>

</sensor>

</sensor>

</sensor>

</sensor>

</sensor>
